City Council
============

Meetings

* 6:00 pm
* Second Monday of each month
* City Hall  
  160 Blackburn St.  
  Reno, TX 75462

Agendas & Minutes  
Agendas are available prior to the meetings.  
[Most Recent Agenda](https://www.renotexas.us/Archive.aspx?AMID=60&Type=Recent "Most Recent City Council Agenda") | [View All](https://www.renotexas.us/Archive.aspx?AMID=60 "View All City Council Agendas")  
  
Minutes are also available following approval.  
[Most Recent Minutes](https://www.renotexas.us/Archive.aspx?AMID=61&Type=Recent "Most Recent City Council Minutes") | [View All](https://www.renotexas.us/Archive.aspx?AMID=61 "View All City Council Minutes")  
  
Council videos are also available.  
[City Council Videos](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXULWeXQPn18MP5J6Sz0-XA "Council Videos")

Members

* [Stacey Nichols, Mayor](https://www.renotexas.us/Directory.aspx?DID=3)  
  **Term Expires:** June 2025
* [Joey McCarthy, Mayor Pro Tem](https://www.renotexas.us/Directory.aspx?EID=58)  
  **Term Expires:**June 2026
* [Amanda Willows](https://www.renotexas.us/Directory.aspx?EID=74 "Amanda Willows")  
  **Term Expires:** June 2025
* [Brandon Thomas](https://www.renotexas.us/Directory.aspx?EID=75)     
  **Term Expires:** June 2026
* Richard Manning  
  **Term Expires:** June 2025
* [Bill Ruthart](https://www.renotexas.us/Directory.aspx?EID=102)
* **Term Expires:** June 2025

Description
-----------

The City of Reno is a type A General Law City governed by a Mayor and City Council members who are elected by the people of the City. The Mayor and City Council acting together are the Governing Body. All Governing Body members serve two-year terms. The Governing Body, being the elected representative of the people, adopts all ordinances and resolutions and determines the general goals and policies.

[City Council Rules of Order and Procedure](https://www.renotexas.us/DocumentCenter/View/1494/City-Council-Rules-of-Order-and-Procedure)
